# <a name="saving-messages-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="8f7c1-102">Shranjevanje sporočil v Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8f7c1-102">Saving messages in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8f7c1-103">E-poštnih sporočil ni mogoče shraniti v Outlook.com, vendar jih lahko natisnete v PDF, ki jih shranite na vašem računalniku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8f7c1-103">You cannot save email messages in Outlook.com, but you can print them to a PDF which you can save on your PC.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8f7c1-104">Microsoft tiskanje v PDF pripomoček, ki vključeni v Windows 10 vam omogoča tiskanje poljuben email vest naravnost v a PDF.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8f7c1-104">The Microsoft Print To PDF utility included in Windows 10 allows you to print any email message directly to a PDF.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="8f7c1-105">Izberite sporočilo, ki ga želite shraniti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8f7c1-105">Select the message you want to save.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="8f7c1-106">Izberite tri pike</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8f7c1-106">Select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="8f7c1-107">na vrhu sporočilo in izberite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8f7c1-107">at the top of the message and then select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="8f7c1-108">**Natisni**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8f7c1-108">**Print**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="8f7c1-109">Ponovno izberite **Print** , in tiskalnik spustnem meniju izberite **Microsoft tiskanje v PDF**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8f7c1-109">Select **Print** again, and from the printer drop-down menu, select **Microsoft Print to PDF**.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="8f7c1-110">Izberite **Natisni**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8f7c1-110">Select **Print**.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="8f7c1-111">Vnesite ime datoteke, nato izberite **Shrani**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8f7c1-111">Enter a file name then select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8f7c1-112">**Opomba:** To ni priporočljivo v skupnih in javnih računalnikih kot drugi uporabniki lahko imajo dostop do vseh dokumentov PDF shranite na PC in ne izbrisati.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8f7c1-112">**Note:** This is not recommended on shared or public computers as other users could have access to any PDFs you save to the PC and don't delete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8f7c1-113">Če želite več informacij o tiskanju, glejte [tiskanje e-poštna sporočila, Priloge in koledarji v Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8f7c1-113">For more information about printing, see [Print email messages, attachments, and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
